about_the_game:
Mirrorscape: Immersive Tabletop Gaming Redefined

Introducing Mirrorscape, the free-to-play app that delivers an immersive and authentic tabletop gaming experience on PC, Mac, iOS and Android. Built for Dungeon Masters (DMs) and players alike, Mirrorscape offers an intuitive and easy-to-use, authentic 3D environment for building and playing your favorite tabletop role-playing and war games.

"Mirrorscape uses AR to create what might be the best D&D virtual tabletop yet" - GamesRadar+

"It's easy to get excited about the augmented tabletop, for how it might further revitalize tabletop gaming.” - Wired

"The promise of living characters and armies battling on the tables before us, across atmospheric and immersive worlds, is arguably too cool to second guess." - Wargamer

Free Starter Set and Trial
Mirrorscape is free-to-play, and every player receives a Free Starter Set of terrain, miniatures, and dice from renowned brands in the tabletop world, including Dwarven Forge, Reaper Minis, Fat Dragon Games and Hero Forge. Claim a bonus of 5 free Hero Forge minis when you link your Hero Forge account. Additionally, to enhance your creativity and world-building abilities Mirrorscape offers a 30-Day Free Trial of everything in the Mirrorscape Store.



Intuitive World-Building
Building has never been easier thanks to Mirrorscapes’s intuitive drag-and-drop stacking, snap points, copy, paste and group functionality and use of clipping planes for multi-level construction of mighty castles, simple taverns and deep, dark dungeons. Bring light to your creations with lit terrain and prop lights. DMs and GMs can easily create intricately detailed adventure maps to be shared with their players and streamed on platforms like Twitch and YouTube. Or, for the “Lazy GM”, grab a pre-built map made by our vibrant user community that fits your campaign or share your own creations on the Mirrorscape Hub!


Authentic Digital Twins for Terrain, Minis, Props and Dice From Famous Tabletop Brands
To create the adventure map of your dreams Mirrorscape boasts a vast collection of fully painted digital twins of terrain, miniatures, props, and dice from famous brands you already know and love including Fat Dragon Games, Dwarven Forge, Reaper Minis, and Norse Foundry. Each item is meticulously crafted to be an authentic replica of the original physical item for an unparalleled level of realism. Digital replicas of real-world dice bounce in the virtual world just like they do on your table.




Dungeon Master Tools to Share and Manage the Adventure
Mirrorscape equips DMs with a comprehensive suite of Dungeon Master Tools to manage game night and craft unforgettable gaming experiences. Once your world is complete, share it with your players for free, then use features like hide and reveal for “fog of war” effects, ambient lighting to set the mood, beacons to draw player’s attention, and line of sight and measurement tools to ensure a seamless and engaging gameplay experience. The built-in Mirrorscape HUB streamlines game scheduling, keeping your adventures organized and accessible while helping players find games and Games Masters find players.




Immersive Player Experience with Character Point-Of-View
Players of role-playing tabletop games and tabletop wargames can choose from a deep collection of beautifully painted miniatures to represent their characters and immerse themselves in their virtual worlds by dropping into their character’s point-of-view. Connect your Hero Forge account and drop your custom minis on the table for even more options! Roll digital dice, inhabit the world from a first-person perspective, check line of sight and bring your adventure to life like never before!



Grow Your Collection
With Mirrorscape you never pay for the same piece twice and with our ‘top off’ system you can buy ready-to-play maps, terrain, and mini bundles from our amazing partners, and only pay for the pieces you don’t already own. Grow your collection and unleash your imagination for an unbeatable value. And remember, anything you buy you share for FREE with your players!

Play Together Anywhere, On Any Device
Cross-play together whether around the table or around the world using your PC or Mac via Steam or our iOS or Android mobile versions for phones and tablets. Design on desktop, tweak on tablets, and have your players join in on their phones. Most features are cross-platform so use the screen and device that works for you!



Explore in Augmented Reality on Mobile
Watch your games come alive with our cutting-edge AR tech on mobile versions for iOS and Android! Drop your maps on your table in authentic, lifelike 3D as if they were real. Roll digital dice that bounce off your actual tabletop! Enter life-scale mode and literally walk through your creations. Players can view the environment through their character’s eyes while it’s being described for an unforgettable experience!



Join the Mirrorscape community today and elevate your tabletop gaming experience!

  • Processor: Intel Core M or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13 (Ventura)
  • Processor: Intel Core M or Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
